description: An RSS reader for Tiny Tiny RSS An offline reader that works with the Tiny Tiny RSS (also known as ttrss or tt-rss) web-based feed reader/aggregator. Features: * Swipe for faster browsing * Optional navigation with volume-buttons * View and download attached media files * Cache articles and images locally * Share URLs * Easily mark things as read, starred or publish/comment them * SSL with self-signed certificates * Fast JSON-Parsing with stream-based parser GSON * Scheduled updates via Tasker/Locale * Layout optimized for tablets * Dark and light themes available * many more, Changelog and Feature-List can be found on the project-page...
